All businesses, big or small, across England will charge at least 10p for a single-use plastic bag from 21 May. 

This is to reduce how much single-use plastic enters our environment.

#PassOnPlastic #TogetherForOurPlanet https://t.co/8hYempGkHP

tweets.text:

Unfortunately another incident of #flytipping that meant @EnvAgencyYNE & @Hullccnews had to team up to clear it away. As much as we love #PartnershipWorking we'd rather spend our time & resources in other ways. #StopFlytipping #LoveYourRivers #flooding https://t.co/LUh4m6QhhB

urls.title: NP11 and partners appoint Strategic Lead for Place and Culture in the North | Cumbria LEP
urls.description: The NP11 group of Northern Local Enterprise Partnerships (LEPs), along with Arts Council England, the Environment Agency, Historic England and the National Lottery Heritage Fund, has recruited a new strategic appointment to support the development of Place and Culture for the North. Clare Devaney joins as Strategic Lead from April 2021 as part of the NP11‚Äôs aim to ensure that the North is recognised as a culturally vibrant and economically successful place by utilising cultural assets and place-based
